items.summary: Create a KnowledgeBoard page component at frontend/src/pages/KnowledgeBoard.tsx that displays comprehensive information about hospital licenses and regulatory requirements

Display hospital license types and categories on the Knowledge Board page including license classifications, regulatory bodies, and compliance requirements based on the reference document from https://www.researchgate.net/publication/398379014_LICENCE_REQUIRED_FOR_HOSPITALS
Display regulatory compliance requirements on the Knowledge Board page covering hospital registration, accreditation standards (NABH, ISO), and legal obligations for healthcare facilities
Update the route configuration in frontend/src/App.tsx to replace the existing '/dashboard' route with a '/knowledge-board' route that renders the KnowledgeBoard page component
Update the Navigation component (frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx) to replace the 'Dashboard' link with a 'Knowledge Board' link that routes to '/knowledge-board'
Apply the existing enterprise design theme (White background, Deep Blue text, professional typography) to the Knowledge Board page ensuring visual consistency with other pages
Add multiple CTAs on the Knowledge Board page including top CTA in hero section, mid-page CTA in content area, and bottom CTA before footer, all encouraging demo bookings
